note.p: Gentleman. Of Duffield, Derbyshire. Friend of Erasmus Darwin (1731–1802). Married Elizabeth Clive (who was not his first wife), sister of Archdeacon Robert Clive, at Moreton Say, Shropshire, in 1756.

p.ref: letter from C. H. Tindal, 1 January 1880
